title: Client wont start
body:
Hello there.
As soon as I click on the client, the league logo appears but instead of the client I get this pop up next :
"could not connect to the HRRP server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking acces."
I've tried changing some stuff in the  adapter , something about DSNR ? Anyway that didn't help.  someone also said something about changing the host file, tried that different ways but it wouldn't let me, so no go there either.  deleting and trying to reinstall also was a big nope.
So what CAN I do? 

I'd like to hear your thoughts about this.

replies.body: This issue is likely caused by a security setting, so adjusting or deleting files is likely to cause you more problems than solve.  Use the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot this and allow access to game files being scanned and launched.  That should get you fixed up!
